text: Francisca Bazalo Gallego (born May 5, 1962 in MÃ¡laga) is a wheelchair fencing athlete from Spain. She has a disability: she uses a wheelchair. She fenced at the 1992 Summer Paralympics. She did not finish in the top 3. She fenced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. She finished third in the foil and third in the sabre. She fenced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney, Australia. She did not finish in the top 3. == References == Category:Spanish fencers Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1992 Summer Paralympics Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Malaga Category:Sportspeople from Andalusia Category:Wheelchair fencers
title: Francisca Bazalo Gallego
